SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT T.DocDate, SUM(T.Total) AS Total, CAST(CASE WHEN paymenttype = 'C' THEN CONCAT('Pendapatan ', IIF(cc = 'RI', 'Rawat Inap', 'Rawat Jalan'), ' Tunai') ELSE CONCAT('TF - ', IIF(cc = 'RI', 'Rawat Inap', 'Rawat Jalan')) end AS VARCHAR(30)) AS Tipe FROM ( select DocDate, IIF(CCTypeCode = 'N', 'RJ', 'RI') cc, CashSum AS Total, CashSum, TrsfrSum, CCTypeCode, 'C' AS paymenttype from ORCT T0 left join OPRC T1 on T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT=T1.PrcCode where T0.canceled='N' and T0.CashSum > 0 and DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' UNION ALL select DocDate, IIF(CCTypeCode = 'N', 'RJ', 'RI') cc, TrsfrSum AS Total, CashSum, TrsfrSum, CCTypeCode, 'T' AS paymenttype from ORCT T0 left join OPRC T1 on T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT=T1.PrcCode where T0.canceled='N' and T0.TrsfrSum > 0 and DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' ) as T WHERE paymenttype= :3 AND CC = :4 GROUP BY T.cc, T.paymenttype, T.DocDate ORDER BY T.DocDate

SELECT T.DocDate, SUM(T.Total) AS Total, CAST(CASE WHEN paymenttype = 'C' THEN CONCAT('Pendapatan ', IIF(cc = 'RI', 'Rawat Inap', 'Rawat Jalan'), ' Tunai') ELSE CONCAT('TF - ', IIF(cc = 'RI', 'Rawat Inap', 'Rawat Jalan')) end AS VARCHAR(30)) AS Tipe FROM ( select DocDate, IIF(CCTypeCode = 'N', 'RJ', 'RI') cc, CashSum AS Total, CashSum, TrsfrSum, CCTypeCode, 'C' AS paymenttype from ORCT T0 left join OPRC T1 on T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT=T1.PrcCode where T0.canceled='N' and T0.CashSum > 0 and DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' UNION ALL select DocDate, IIF(CCTypeCode = 'N', 'RJ', 'RI') cc, TrsfrSum AS Total, CashSum, TrsfrSum, CCTypeCode, 'T' AS paymenttype from ORCT T0 left join OPRC T1 on T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT=T1.PrcCode where T0.canceled='N' and T0.TrsfrSum > 0 and DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' ) as T WHERE paymenttype=':3' AND CC = ':4' GROUP BY T.cc, T.paymenttype, T.DocDate ORDER BY T.DocDate
